I have always been passionate about using latest technologies like AI and creating useful application using Django/.NET/ React / Xamarin / RESTful APIs / Java Spring / TensorFlow. main.bio: It's been more than 7 years since I started my carrier in IT. Throughout the years, I have gained experience in programming languages like Python, Javascript, C#, Java, C++, C, COBOL, and Dart, and eager to add more to the list. After completing my Bachelors in Computer Engineering, I got exposure to Artificial Intelligence Technologies, which I used that knowledge solving 6 unique business problems and counting. I made myself up to date with the technologies that today businesses are using. With these 7 years of expertise, I found that my speed of learning and adopting to new technologies have increased with all the basics clear. During my School days, I found myself as 'Math Guy', as I was exceptionally doing excellent in all my Mathematics classes. The best way to utilize my talent is to go with Computer Engineering where my Math knowledge will be leveraged practically. Till now, I used my same talent solving challenging business problems which inspires to do more for Humankind. I have also done an extensive research in the field of SAR Polarimetry dealing data processing using ISRO satellite data. Published 2 Research Papers and 1 Journal Paper under the same field, under guidance of Prof. Pooja Shah.

Darshan and I worked as a part of the same engagement at the AI/HUB in Durham College, Oshawa. Darshan's ability to effortlessly translate between the technical and business side of things is a testament to his strengths as a professional. Darshan is a reliable member of the team who leads by example with a sound technical knowledge and is always willing to help whenever he can. He has a constant zest to learn more, and shares his knowledge with others around him enabling others to learn and grow as well. He exemplifies team work and always goes an extra mile to help his colleagues in any way he can. I am very sure where ever he will work, he will surely get the success he deserves and take that very organisation to new heights. Wish you All the Best, Darshan!
